#Load IRIS dataset from the TIDYVERSE 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species)) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```
CHARACTER 
```{r}
iris_function1 = function(x) {
  if(!is.numeric(x))
    replace_na(x, "virginica")
  }
```
NUMERIC 
```{r}
iris_function2 = function(y) {
  if(is.numeric(y))
    replace_na(mean(y, na.rm = TRUE))
  }
```
CHECK FUNCTION 
```{r}
iris_with_missing %>%
iris_function2(sepal_length)

iris_function2(iris_with_missing$petal_width)

mean(iris_with_missing$petal_width, na.rm=TRUE)
```

```{r}
replace_iris1 = map(.x=iris_with_missing, ~iris_function1(.x))
replace_iris1
```
